mapper.select: SELECT zcode, cnzcode, ambulance, police, fire, sea_emerg, road_emerg, unionpay_call, embassy_city, embassy_addr, embassy_call, embassy_time FROM country WHERE name = #{country}
SELECT type, phone FROM car_rental JOIN country ON car_rental.country = country.id WHERE country.name = #{country}
SELECT user.name, user.phone FROM user JOIN group_user ON user.id = group_user.user WHERE `group` = #{group} AND type = 0 ORDER BY group_user.update_date
SELECT car_rental.phone FROM car_rental JOIN country ON car_rental.country = country.id WHERE country.name = #{country} AND car_rental.type = '1'

SELECT id, `name` FROM `group` WHERE id = #{group} UNION SELECT chat_id AS 'id', chat_name AS 'name' FROM `group` WHERE id = #{group} UNION SELECT id, `name` FROM team WHERE group_id = #{group} AND id IN ( SELECT team_id FROM team_user WHERE user_id = #{user} )
SELECT local_phone.`name`, phone FROM local_phone JOIN country ON local_phone.country = country.id WHERE country.`name` = #{country}
